title: Urban 1Bed/1Bath - 1st Month Free!
map_address: 1819 Nagle Pl near Nagle Place & Barbara Bailey Way
posting_body: This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 484 Sq.
Make your mark in the epicenter of culture, diversity and self-expression in one of Seattle’s trendiest neighborhoods.
Connection on Broadway offers a lifestyle that blurs the line between vibrant city life and a inclusive neighborhood.
Immerse yourself in an energetic location in the center of Capitol Hill, with a public farmers market on-site and Cal Anderson Park in your own backyard.
At home, take advantage of attractive amenities thoughtfully curated to enhance your daily routine, from a fitness center and yoga studio to a rooftop terrace.

Engineered Hardwood Flooring, Roller Shades, Quartz Countertop, Air Conditioning, Build In Kitchen Island*, Energy Star Rated Appliance Package, Gas Cooktop*, Views of Cal Anderson Park*, Balcony/Patio*, Multiple Cabinet Finishes, Electric Cooktop

Fitness Center and Yoga Studio, Bike Storage, H-Mart: Coming Soon!, Remote Work Spaces, 10 Unique Community Spaces, Additional Storage Available, On Site Café: Coming Soon, On Site Boba Tea Shop: Coming Soon, Controlled Access Entry, Easy Access to Link Light Rail, Pet Spa, Rooftop Grills and Fire Pits, On Site Brunch/Lunch Restaurant: Coming Soon!,
Weekly On Site Farmers Market, Pet Park, Garage Parking, On Site Management & Maintenance, Pet Friendly, On Site Community Plaza, Easy Access to Local Parks
Pet policy: We allow two(2) pets per unit with no weight limit following Greystar breed restrictions.
Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.
Use this link for more information:
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
